
```{r count_duplicated_comps_in_market_df}

duplicated_comps = market_df %>% 
  select(tase_id, sec_id) %>% 
  distinct() %>% 
  count(tase_id,name = "number_of_secs", sort = TRUE)

duplicated_comps = duplicated_comps %>% 
  left_join(select(stocks_ipo, tase_id) %>% 
              distinct() %>% 
              mutate(ipo_ind = 1),by = join_by(tase_id)) %>% 
  mutate(ipo_ind = replace_na(ipo_ind,0))

multiple_secs_comps = duplicated_comps %>% 
  filter(number_of_secs > 1) %>% 
  nrow()

multiple_secs_comps_ipo = duplicated_comps %>% 
  filter(number_of_secs > 1) %>% 
  filter(ipo_ind == 1) %>% 
  nrow()


```

Market df has `r multiple_secs_comps` companies with more than one
security ( `r multiple_secs_comps_ipo` IPO companies), I remove them
